text:
Three police personnel were on Tuesday injured as their motorcycles collided while performing stunts during Republic Day function here.

The accident occurred at the function attended by Governor Kalyan Singh and Chief Minister Vasundhara Raje, at Dr Karni Singh Stadium here, the police said.

The personnel, part of the motorcycle display team, were performing stunts when their bikes collided, they said.

The injured, identified as Gayard Singh, Chaina Ram and Daya Singh, were rushed to PBM Hospital here where they were stated to be out of danger. Later, Ms. Raje visited the hospital and enquired the injured personnel about their health. - PTI
title: Three cops injured
